title: Generate a Paper Claim
description: A small insurance company does not accept electronic claims. A biller needs to generate a paper CMS-1500 form for a claim.

tasks.description: Identify the claim that needs to be sent on paper.
tasks.expected_outcome: Biller locates the claim for the non-electronic payer.

tasks.description: Select the 'Print to CMS-1500' option in the billing system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system populates the claim data onto a digital image of the CMS-1500 form.

tasks.description: Print the form and mail it to the payer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The paper claim is successfully printed and prepared for mailing.
